languages.text: "Довольно болтовни с ксеносами. Их слова пропитаны ложью. Стоит впустить ее в свои уши, и ты становишься марионеткой на их нитях! Предадим здесь всех смерти, взметем кровавый буран — вот будет угодный Всеотцу поступок!"

traits.locale_text: "Довольно болтовни с ксеносами. Их слова пропитаны ложью. Стоит впустить ее в свои уши, и ты становишься марионеткой на их нитях! Предадим здесь всех смерти, взметем кровавый буран — вот будет угодный Всеотцу поступок!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно болтовни с ксеносами. Их слова пропитаны ложью. Стоит впустить ее в свои уши, и ты становишься марионеткой на их нитях! Предадим здесь всех смерти, взметем кровавый буран — вот будет угодный Всеотцу поступок!"

traits.locale_text: "I've had enough of talks with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet hanging on their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I've had enough of talks with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet hanging on their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « J'en ai assez de discuter avec des xénos. Leurs paroles sont lourdes de mensonges. Si elles ont le malheur d'atteindre vos oreilles, vous devenez leur marionnette ! Éliminons-les dans un bain de sang. Cela fera un digne sacrifice en l'honneur du Père de tous ! »
languages.original_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai assez de discuter avec des xénos. Leurs paroles sont lourdes de mensonges. Si elles ont le malheur d'atteindre vos oreilles, vous devenez leur marionnette ! Éliminons-les dans un bain de sang. Cela fera un digne sacrifice en l'honneur du Père de tous ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我和异形已经没什么好说的了。他们的话里全都是谎言，只要他们对你的耳朵开了口，你就会变成提线木偶，被他们牵着走！我要刮起一场腥风血雨，把他们所有人统统杀光！为了全父的荣耀！”
languages.original_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: “我和异形已经没什么好说的了。他们的话里全都是谎言，只要他们对你的耳朵开了口，你就会变成提线木偶，被他们牵着走！我要刮起一场腥风血雨，把他们所有人统统杀光！为了全父的荣耀！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族と話すのはもうたくさんだ。奴らの言葉は嘘ばかりだ。一度その言葉を耳にすれば、たちまち連中の操り人形になる！奴らを荒れ狂う血の嵐の中で皆殺しにしてやろう。それが全知の父への手向けとなる！」
languages.original_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: 「異種族と話すのはもうたくさんだ。奴らの言葉は嘘ばかりだ。一度その言葉を耳にすれば、たちまち連中の操り人形になる！奴らを荒れ狂う血の嵐の中で皆殺しにしてやろう。それが全知の父への手向けとなる！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe es echt satt, mit Xenos zu reden. Ihre Worte sind gespickt mit Lügen. Sobald man diese zu sich durchlässt, wird man zu ihren willfährigen Marionetten! Wir werden sie alle in einem wirbelnden Blutsturm töten – alles zu Ehren des Allvaters!"
languages.original_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe es echt satt, mit Xenos zu reden. Ihre Worte sind gespickt mit Lügen. Sobald man diese zu sich durchlässt, wird man zu ihren willfährigen Marionetten! Wir werden sie alle in einem wirbelnden Blutsturm töten – alles zu Ehren des Allvaters!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Ya estoy harto de hablar con xenos. Todo lo que dicen son mentiras. ¡Si dejas que sus palabras lleguen a tus oídos, te convierten en una marioneta y mueven tus hilos! Les daremos muerte a todos en un torbellino de sangre; ¡así honraremos al Padre de Todo!».
languages.original_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: «Ya estoy harto de hablar con xenos. Todo lo que dicen son mentiras. ¡Si dejas que sus palabras lleguen a tus oídos, te convierten en una marioneta y mueven tus hilos! Les daremos muerte a todos en un torbellino de sangre; ¡así honraremos al Padre de Todo!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Zenolarla konuşmaktan bıktım. Ağızlarından çıkan her laf yalan. Söyledikleri kulağına girer girmez ellerinde kukla oluyoruz! Hepsini deşe deşe katledeceğiz... Yücebaba'nın onuruna yaraşır bir iş çıkacak!"
languages.original_text: "I've had enough talking with xenos. Their words are thick with lies. Once you let them touch your ears, you become a puppet pulled by their strings! We will put them all to death in a whirling bloodstorm — that will be a deed to honour the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: "Zenolarla konuşmaktan bıktım. Ağızlarından çıkan her laf yalan. Söyledikleri kulağına girer girmez ellerinde kuklaya dönüşüyor insan! Hepsini deşe deşe katledeceğiz... Yücebaba'nın onuruna yaraşır bir iş çıkacak!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
